item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A. Set up: Create an on-chain crypto wallet Install the extension on your browser Go to https://metamask.io/download/ and Click “Install Metamask for Chromium” Add the wallet extension to the Chrome on Firefox Browser (DO NOT use Safari) Follow guideline to create a wallet Click to the Metamask Icon to use the wallet For those who haven’t had any wallet, please click “Create a new wallet” Enter the password for the wallet Read the instruction of Wallet security and Choose “Secure my wallet” Reveal and copy the seed phrase, the save it at a safe place.

item.title: Estimation Guidelines
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we conduct an estimation, it is recommended to abandon the transitional “exact hours” assessment method, instead, use the story point based on the Fibonacci number (1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21…). The number expresses an estimation of the overall effort required to fully implement a backlog item or any piece of work.
